{"id":940706536,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1682615145,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/940706536/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"43.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {\n        int k=lcs(word1,word2);\n        return ((word1.length()-k)+(word2.length()-k));\n    }\n    public int lcs(String text1, String text2) {\n        int n=text1.length();\n        int m=text2.length();\n        int prev[]=new int[m+1];\n        int cur[]=new int[m+1];\n        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=1;j<=m;j++)\n            {\n                if(text1.charAt(i-1)==text2.charAt(j-1))cur[j]=1+prev[j-1];\n                else cur[j]=0+(int)Math.max(prev[j],cur[j-1]);\n            }\n            prev=(int[])(cur.clone());\n        }\n        return prev[m];\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false}
